title: Clairol Nice 'N Easy Born Blonde Hair Color, Maxi 1 Kit
description: Nice 'n Easy Born Blonde delivers simply blonde bliss. Born Blonde Maxi is for use on dark blonde to black hair. Clairol offers a complete range of easy to use blonding hair color products that give you brilliant, natural-looking blonde results. Whether your starting color is light blonde to dark brown or even black, you can easily become completely, beautifully blonde with results that feel incredibly soft & silky.

title: Wella Color Charm T18 White Lady 1.4oz
description:
Wella Color Charm Permanent Liquid Hair Toner #T18 White Lady (New Name: Lightest Ash Blonde)

Wella Color Charm Toners are ideal to create pure double process blonde hair color results. These Toners remove remaining "brass" for perfect blondes every time.

Extra Mild Toner
Gentle to the Hair	
Tones Pre-Lightened Hair Evenly

Directions:
Pre-lighten the hair to the required level before applying toner. Mix 1 part Wella Color Charm toning color with 2 parts 20 volume Wella Color Charm Developer. Apply to towel dried hair and develop for up to 30 minutes, checking frequently for desired result.

Size: 1.4oz / 42ml
